name: 蕭佳芸
objective:
本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。

In this course, students will read, imitate, and respond to examples of prose written by a variety of authors in a number of contexts. Students will practice writing in every session and will be graded on participation (20%) and work submitted in each class (80%).
schedule:
WEEK 1
Free write, autobiographical essay

WEEK 2
Gary Steiner, “Animal, Vegetable, Miserable”

WEEK 3
Responding to Gary Steiner

WEEK 4
C. S. Lewis, “We Have No ‘Right to Happiness’”

WEEK 5
Jason Green, “Did Dorothea Lange Pose Her Subject for Migrant Mother?”

WEEK 6
Richard Rhodes, “Hollow Claims about Fantasy Violence”

WEEK 7
Lou Jacobs, Jr., “What Qualities Does a Good Photograph Have?”

WEEK 8 
Zoe Morales, “Dancing at Durango”

WEEK 9 Midterm

WEEK 10-11
Unit, “All in the Family”

WEEK 12-14
“Identities”

WEEK 15-18
“Teaching and Learning”
scorePolicy: Students will practice writing in every session and will be graded on participation (20%) and work submitted in each class (80%).
materials: Marcia Stubbs and Sylvan Barnet, The Little, Brown Reader, 12th Edition
